txt.en: 'Let us aid these men!'
'Nay.'
'Lady Éowyn! I did not expect to see you here!'
'That's enough!'
'Well, well... I guess a few are alive after all, boys!'
Instance: Stilling the Wade
'I wonder if they'll scream as well as the others!'
'Why don't we find out?'
'Come, let us aid Síric!'
'The White Hand have already reached the Wade! We must aid Edric's men!'
'To the mead hall!'
'Ready your arms!'
'More are coming! Do not falter!'
'We shall hold position here in case the Orcs return!'
'Seek out Síric! He and the others are defending the northern border of Entwade.'
'Rohan belongs to the White Hand!'
'Woman, don't you wish to know how they suffered when we ran them down?'
'[placeholder]... and Lady Éowyn! I am Agelman, at your service!'
'I mean you no offence, Lady Éowyn, but I shall not seek shelter.'
'I would sooner die than allow the White Hand to claim Entwade...'
'...especially after the horrors they visited upon our people.'
'I shall seek it for all of them...but where is Thane Edric?'
'We shall do what we can, Síric.'
'Look ahead! We must aid Kenbert and Magenred!'
'Womar, Gifel... take up positions in the towers!'
'Éowyn, [placeholder], and I shall secure the western flank!'
'Go!'
'Come, let us make for the western flank!'
'Should they bolster their numbers, I fear for the Wade.'
'We shall take up positions in the towers and aid the archers!'
'We are spread too thinly! Not enough men remain to repel such a force!'
'Look ahead, the White Hand has returned!'
'Well met, yet you bear naught but a sword and shield.'
'Without armour, you stand little chance against the White Hand...'
'Very well, let us press on!'
'Your courage is admirable, ill-advised as it may be. I shall not deny you vengeance.'
'You ask if I wish to hear of such things?'
'We must secure the gates of Entwade!'
'He is in Edoras, and there remains no time to speak of such things.'
'You are beaten, Uruk. Such a boast stands as weakly as you!'
'We shall hold the Orcs here! [placeholder], you must push forth and defeat the ones attacking the palisades!'
'Edric's men are scattered and would be grateful for any aid we can muster!'
'Let us drive the White Hand from the Wade!'
'Our riders shall not rest until your kind are purged from our lands!'
